description: This file sets up an AI agent using Cerebras model, Postgres storage, and DuckDuckGo tools, then queries the agent with questions about Canada.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent that integrates a model, storage, and tools to process queries.

classes.name: Cerebras
classes.description: A model class representing Cerebras AI models.

classes.name: PostgresStorage
classes.description: A storage class for persisting data in a PostgreSQL database.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A tool class for performing searches using DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output the agent's response to a given prompt.
